hints.title: Unconditional LSI for Euclidean Gas (TARGET)
hints.content:
378: :label: thm-unconditional-lsi
379: 
380: Under the foundational axioms:
381: 1. Confining potential: $U(x) \to \infty$ as $|x| \to \infty$ with $\langle \nabla U, x \rangle \geq \alpha_U |x|^2$
382: 2. Positive friction: $\gamma > 0$
383: 3. Positive kinetic noise: $\sigma_v^2 > 0$
384: 4. Bounded fitness: $|g(x, v, S)| \leq G_{\max}$
385: 5. Sufficient cloning noise: $\delta^2 \geq \delta_{\min}^2$
386: 
387: **WITHOUT assuming**:
388: - ❌ Convexity of $U(x)$
389: - ❌ Log-concavity of $\pi_{\text{QSD}}$
390: - ❌ Any smoothness of fitness landscape
391: 
392: The Euclidean Gas satisfies a Logarithmic Sobolev Inequality:
393: 
394: $$
395: \text{Ent}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}(f^2) \leq C_{\text{LSI}} \cdot \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}[|\nabla f|^2]
396: $$
397: 
398: where:
399: 
400: $$
401: C_{\text{LSI}} = \frac{C_0}{2\lambda_{\text{hypo}}} \cdot f(\tau, \lambda_{\text{clone}}, G_{\max})
402: $$
403: 
404: with:
405: - $\lambda_{\text{hypo}} = c \cdot \min(\gamma, \alpha_U/\sigma_v^2)$ is the hypocoercive rate
406: - $\lambda_{\text{clone}}$ is the cloning rate
407: - $f(\cdot)$ is a computable function (depends on proof method)
408: - $C_0 = O(1)$ is a universal constant
